CONTEXT: Small bot invoice uploader. Currently used by fin department. About 2500 invoices uploaded in 2023 and hundreds of hours saved (Modified).
Small profile webapp using Flask framework. Just the repository of this website.
Direct shortcut. Launches the erp system webapp module directly with few quick access buttons instead of having to click around in the UI through the web browser.

The finance deparment obtains a monthly invoice batch where hundred of invoices gets generated. If an invoice belongs to a specific project, it requires pre-approved timesheets support by the client attached to it.
freeCodeCamp.com Certification Challenges. Helped me Learn how much I dont know
